short_summary: A Request for Proposal for GEO  Info services
description: This is a request for proposal for Geo Info Services
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Geographic Information System (GIS) Requirement

### Summary

Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), a Canadian government agency, is seeking a contractor to provide Geographic Information System (GIS) services.

### Contract Details

- **Contract Reference Number**: cb-736-167459
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Solicitation Number**: 30004536
- **Publication Date**: June 10, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: July 9, 2024
- **Amendment Date**: July 9, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: September 28, 2029

### Project Description

The successful contractor shall provide GIS services, including programming and system architect services, to support DFO's operations.

### Eligibility Criteria

Qualified contractors must be holders of the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (with a Tier 1 qualification) and shall demonstrate expertise in Level 3 Geographic Information System (GIS) Programmer/Analyst and Level 3 Geographic Information System (GIS) System Architect categories.

### Important Dates

- **Publication Date**: June 10, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: July 9, 2024
- **Amendment Date**: July 9, 2024

### Contact Information

- **Name**: Jean Francois Guilmeus
- **Email**: jeanfrancois.guilmeus@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (343) 630-0762
- **Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1A 0E6

### Documents

- [Documents can be accessed at Canadabuy's website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39863/30004536---npp---amd-1.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39863/30004536---npp.pdf)

### Procurement Details

- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, NAFTA, WTO GPA, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, and others.
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: Remote Offsite and Canada
- **Contracting Entity**: Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
